category.name: FMS
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Default_Transient_Server
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default transient file server location. Environment variable settings override this FCC configuration file setting. Valid Values: Accepts a single value. Must be a valid transient file server location. For example: Default_Transient_Serrver = http://www.transientserver.com
